org.hps.record.composite

Class CompositeLoopConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hps.record.composite.CompositeLoopConfiguration

  • public final class CompositeLoopConfiguration
extends Object
    A configuration object for the CompositeLoop. The instance variables are readable within the package, e.g. by CompositeLoop, but their values must be set through the public set methods when the class is used outside its package. Depending on how this object is setup, some arguments may end up being ignored (e.g. setting a file path when actually using an ET server, etc.).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private List<CompositeRecordProcessor> compositeProcessors
      List of composite record processors.
      private EtConnection connection
      The ET connection which will be null if not using an ET system.
      private List<Driver> drivers
      The list of LCSim Drivers.
      private List<EtEventProcessor> etProcessors
      The list of ET processors.
      private LCSimEventBuilder eventBuilder
      The LCSim event builder for creating LCIO events from EVIO (can be null).
      private List<EvioEventProcessor> evioProcessors
      The list of EVIO processors.
      private String filePath
      Path to a file source.
      private int maxQueueSize
      The maximum queue size if using an LCIO record queue.
      private long maxRecords
      The maximum number of records to process (-1 for unlimited).
      private ProcessingStage processingStage
      The processing stage to execute (all prior stages will be included).
      private org.freehep.record.source.RecordSource recordSource
      The record source for the loop.
      private DataSourceType sourceType
      The data source type which defaults to an ET system.
      private boolean stopOnEndRun
      Flag for stopping the event processing on end of run.
      private boolean stopOnErrors
      Flag for stopping the event processing on errors.
      private boolean supplyLcioEvents
      Flag to enable supplying events to the JAS3 record source lookup system.
      private long timeout
      The timeout on the LCIO record queue in milliseconds, if applicable.

      • setLCSimEventBuilder

        public CompositeLoopConfiguration setLCSimEventBuilder(LCSimEventBuilder eventBuilder)
        Set the LCSimEventBuilder that will be used to translate from raw EVIO events to LCIO. The detector name will be set on this object from within CompositeLoop.
        Parameters:
        eventBuilder - the LCSimEventBuilder object
        Returns:
        this object

      • setProcessingStage

        public CompositeLoopConfiguration setProcessingStage(ProcessingStage processingStage)
        Set the processing stage to include i.e. ET only, ET to EVIO, or all three.

        This may be ignored if the argument does not make sense given the DataSourceType of this configuration.

        Parameters:
        processingStage - the processing stages to execute
        Returns:
        this object

      • setRecordSource

        public CompositeLoopConfiguration setRecordSource(org.freehep.record.source.RecordSource recordSource)

        Parameters:
        recordSource - the RecordSource that will supply records
        Returns:
        this object

      • setStopOnEndRun

        public CompositeLoopConfiguration setStopOnEndRun(boolean stopOnEndRun)
        Set whether loop will stop when an end of run record is encountered e.g. from an EvioEvent.
        Parameters:
        stopOnEndRun - true to stop on end of run
        Returns:
        this object

      • setStopOnErrors

        public CompositeLoopConfiguration setStopOnErrors(boolean stopOnErrors)
        Set whether the loop will stop when event processing errors occur. Certain types of errors are considered fatal or are used to control the loop and will never be ignored (e.g. ET system errors, etc.).
        Parameters:
        stopOnErrors - true to stop the loop when errors occur
        Returns:
        this object

      • setSupplyLcioEvents

        public CompositeLoopConfiguration setSupplyLcioEvents(boolean supplyLcioEvents)
        Set whether to supply LCIO events to a DataSource that will automatically register itself to JAS3 in order to activate Wired, the LCSim Event Browser, etc.
        Parameters:
        supplyLcioEvents - true to supply LCIO events to JAS3
        Returns:
        this object

      • setTimeout

        public CompositeLoopConfiguration setTimeout(long timeout)
        Set the timeout when calling next on the LCIO record queue.
        Parameters:
        timeout - the timeout in milliseconds
        Returns:
        this object
